lyrics:
"Keep It Real" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Keep It Real" [Intro:] Guwop Gucci [Verse 1:] Gucci Mane a bitch, I'm gonna hit him in his shit Gucci mob, he don't throw fists, all he do is diss Getting shots off my yapper, how bad you want a hit? Ayo with Mike in this and homie big boy 200 bitch I ain't buying globe game, that 300 shit I feel Woo and freak just met, they on that broke shit I'm on that level, if you broke then I can't smoke it I want 500 bricks, still rob yo ass for 4 bricks Can't find a 4th, I'm cookin dope with the remote, bitch I took yo best and went and smoked it with yo artist I fucked yo mama secretary in the office And I'm so hood I'm pourin codeine in my coffee [Hook:] Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Man these niggas broke as hell man and I can see they ribs Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Man these bitches broke as hell man and I can see they ribs [Verse 2:] Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Nigga say he fucked my bitch and he couldn't wait to squeal What's a bitch to a nigga like me with the M Would shit break if it's yo head? I'll hook a thrower back in Let her swim, let her swim Like a brim let her swim Call me Mr. Gucci Mane, call him NeverHeardOfHim Man that nigga suck a nigga dick just to get a deal Gucci Mane keep it real, I told er scrap, that's what it is [Hook:] Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Man these niggas broke as hell man and I can see they ribs Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Keep it real, Keep it real, Keep it real Man these bitches broke as hell man and I can see they ribs [Outro:] Man, what's happenin? It's Big Gucci Le Fleur himself Selfmade millionaire And I'm still trickin out with yo bitch with the show money nigga 33 years young Young old ass nigga I got my eye on 100 M's Don't worry about the beef Not the beef in the can I'm the CEO All beef will be expected Yea, you lookin at the man nigga Guwop if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Writer(s): Xavier Dotson, Radric Davis AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Diary Of A Trap God" (2013) Decapitated Me Cutters Pablo I Heard Cali Keep It Real Pussy Wet Show A Young Nigga She A Soldier High Power Cowards Recognize Half Nuthin On Ya Nights Like This Choppers All These Bitches Virgin Stash House Fall Back Club Swole Cold Hearted Realest Ever Lived Search
title: Keep It Real Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
